text: Demographic data presented in Table 1 show that both groups were similar for type and severity of the operation and perioperative risk factors. The primary study endpoint IL-6 values of the SDC group were significantly lower than those of the placebo group at several time points after the surgery (Fig 1) . C-reactive protein values acted in the similar fashion (Fig 1) . On the contrary, the mean antiinflammatory cytokine IL-10 and white cell blood count values were significantly higher for the SDC group (Fig 1) .
sentences: Demographic data presented in Table 1 show that both groups were similar for type and severity of the operation and perioperative risk factors.
The primary study endpoint IL-6 values of the SDC group were significantly lower than those of the placebo group at several time points after the surgery (Fig 1) .
C-reactive protein values acted in the similar fashion (Fig 1) .
On the contrary, the mean antiinflammatory cytokine IL-10 and white cell blood count values were significantly higher for the SDC group (Fig 1) .
